meta.name: description
meta.content: Children of the Ligonier Valley School District will be provided comprehensive educational opportunities in safe and supportive environments to maximize individual potential.

li.a: District Report Card / School Performance Profile

span.span: Learners Have Graduated With Associate Degrees Before High School Graduation
College Credits earned by 97 Learners in 2019
Saved by Learners Through Dual Enrollment Classes in 2019
of Learners Attend Eastern Westmoreland Career and Technology Center
News Best High School Silver Medalist

div.div: Our goal is to provide the best distance learning experience possible during the school closure. As we move forward, we know that you, as a parent, can provide us with valuable information. Please complete a short survey to let us know what is working for you and offer suggestions on what can be improved upon in the distance learning environment. Participation is optional. You can access the survey by clicking on the news headline.
